title: Online PBL Education for Applying Evidence-Based Practice (EBP) in Nursing

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Knowledge and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: Intermediate-level program designed for practicing nurses. Asynchronous learning environment utilizing digital devices (laptops/tablets)

learning_goals: Learners can systematically perform the seven stages of EBP (problem definition, literature search, evidence evaluation, integration, implementation, evaluation, dissemination) based on virtual clinical scenarios.
Learners can resolve practical issues encountered when applying the EBP process through small-group collaboration.
Learners can write an EBP project proposal applicable to their clinical environment through individual assignments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
